name: Curtis BRAXTON aka William Braxton, Petitioner v. Hon. Gary S. GLAZER, Respondent

parties: Curtis BRAXTON aka William Braxton, Petitioner v. Hon. Gary S. GLAZER, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of July, 2014, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED. The Prothonotary is directed to strike the jurist’s name from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
97 A.3d 337
Curtis BRAXTON aka William Braxton, Petitioner v. Hon. Gary S. GLAZER, Respondent.
No. 69 EM 2014.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 28, 2014.
